name: Haunted Hills
description:
----------------------------------------------------

Haunted Hills is a wave-based tower defense game, in which you try to keep your haunted house skeleton-free.

As a ghost you can't do much, so you build an army with the skeletons' remains. Wander around the area and destroy the tombstones before any skeletons can rise. 

----------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD  - Player Movement

Q / E - Camera Movement

Y     - Lock/Unlock Camera

Action Buttons:

  1. Spawn Pumpling (on mouse cursor) - 5 bones
  2. Spawn Suicide Bomber (on mouse cursor) - 3 bones
  3. Repair Fence (when standing near) - 5 bones

----------------------------------------------------

Gameplay:

  • Destroy tombstones and kill the rising skeletons
  • Create an army to increase your chances of surviving
  • Defeat the boss at the end of each wave

----------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the DAE Spooky Game Jam. Our team members:

  • Remi Verlinden : Gameplay Programmer
  • Tatiana Devos : Artist (Environment Props and FX)
  • Levi John : Artist (Characters and UI)
  • Maksym Nekleva : Artist (Level Layout and Sounds)

----------------------------------------------------

Download Instructions: Download both zips, select both zips, right click and choose "Extract to HauntedHills/"
